actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual an income tax deduction for the expenses of traveling to and from work by means of mass transportation facilities.

summary.text: Allows an individual an income tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for the ordinary and necessary expenses of traveling to and from work by means of mass transportation faciiities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual an income tax deduction for the expenses of traveling to and from work by means of mass transportation facilities.
